name: More Paul Newman Movies Trivia Game | People Themed | 10 Questions

questions.text: Newman developed a liking for car racing when he starred in which of these movies?
In "The Rack", Newman is charged with what crime?
questions.explanation:
Collaboration.

	He's charged with collaborating with the enemy while a prisoner during wartime. Good movie early in his career with a fine cast: Walter Pidgeon, Edmond O'Brien, Wendell Corey & Anne Francis.

questions.text: "Quintet" is set in what type of climate?
questions.explanation:
Arctic wasteland.

	Arguably Newman's worst movie, it bombed big time - with good reason.

questions.text: Newman starred in "The Left Handed Gun". To what famous outlaw did the title refer?
questions.explanation:
Billy the Kid.

	Early in his career. Not memorable.

Buffalo Bill, Judge Roy Bean.

	He starred in one movie as Bill and in another as Bean. Neither was particularly good; neither did well.

questions.text: Joan Collins appeared in which of these Paul Newman movies?
options: The Secret  War of Harry Frigg
questions.explanation:
Rally 'Round The Fllag, Boys.

	"Flag" was a comedy early in his career. Joanne Woodward also co-starred. "Chalice" was his debut movie. "Terrace" included Joanne Woodward in the cast. "Frigg" was a light comedy.

questions.text: Barbara Rush co-starred with Newman in "The Young Philadelphians". In which other Newman movie did she appear?
questions.explanation:
Hombre.

	In "Philadelphians" ( a good movie), she plays the romantic interest. In "Hombre" (also enjoyable) she plays a victim that Newman tries to rescue. (For a while, his movies all seemed to start with "H".)

questions.text: Newman has worked with many fine supporting actors. In which movie did he work with Wilford Brimley?
options: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
questions.explanation:
Absence of Malice.

	Brimley was in "Malice". Jack Warden was in "Verdict". Harold Gould was in "Sting". Strother Martin was in "Butch". All good actors; all good movies.

questions.text: Newman co-starred with James Garner in which of these movies?
questions.explanation:
Twilight.

	Newman stars in what is probably best-described as a detective movie. The cast includes Garner, Gene Hackman and Susan Sarandon. It didn't do that well, but it's not bad.

questions.text: Newman has starred in movies about all of these sports EXCEPT:
questions.explanation:
Baseball.

	Pool figured prominently in "Hustler" (and in "Color of Money"). Boxing was key in "Somebody Up There Likes Me". "Slap Shot" featured Newman as a hockey coach.
